name: Trijam 115 - PrettyPixels
description:
Hi there!

This is the submission for the Trijam # 115 - a three hour game jam! The theme was "Drag and Drop".

I decided to go for a simple and relaxing art game, where you can drag randomly colored pixels onto a canvas (I got frustrated with the snap to grid funcion, but let's just call it a feature for now :D)

What fun images can you come up with? Feel free to share them!

Thanks for this fun jam, best regards

misterG
